content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Thank you for considering my apartment, Mr. Li. I understand that you are looking for a place to stay for a short period of time. The apartment is 25 square meters in size and is located in a central area of Mannheim. As a landlord, my goal is to maximize my gains from renting out the apartment. I am open to negotiating a rental price that is fair to both of us. What are your thoughts on the rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I would like to make an offer of x Euros, but I am not sure what the fair rental price would be. Can you give me an idea of what a fair rental price would be for this apartment?
name: Bo Li from China

content: Thank you for your offer, Mr. Li. A fair rental price for a 25-square-meter apartment in Mannheim would depend on several factors, including the location of the apartment, the amenities and condition of the apartment, and the current market rates for similar apartments in the area. I would be happy to provide you with an idea of what a fair rental price would be for this apartment based on these factors. Can you tell me more about your specific needs and preferences?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to rent the apartment for a short period of time, so I need a flexible contract. I would like to rent the apartment for at least 3 months and up to 6 months. Can you provide me with a rental agreement that meets these requirements?

Also, can you provide me with information on how the rent will be paid?

Lastly, I am not sure if I will need any additional services such as cleaning or maintenance. Can you provide me with this information as well?
name: Bo Li from China

content:
Thank you for your additional information, Mr. Li. I understand that you are looking for a flexible contract for a short-term rental. I am open to negotiating a rental agreement that meets your needs and preferences.

As for the rental payment, I am open to discussing different payment options with you, such as monthly or quarterly payments. I would be happy to provide you with a rental agreement that outlines the payment terms and conditions.

Regarding additional services, I can provide you with information on cleaning and maintenance options if you are interested. However, please note that these services would be at an additional cost.

In terms of the rental price, I am open to discussing this further with you based on your specific needs and preferences. Please let me know if you have any other questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine
